text: Ni shuo:“Shei shi tiandi de zhu?” Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu.” Ni shuo:“Nandao nimen she zhenzhu er ba naxie buneng zizhu huo fu zhe dang zuo baohu zhe ma?” Ni shuo:“Mangren yu fei mangren shi xiangdeng de ma? Hei'an yu guangming shi xiangdeng de ma?” Tamen wei zhenzhu shulile xuduo huoban, nandao naxie huoban neng xiang zhenzhu nayang chuangzao wanwu, yizhi tamen buneng fenbian liang zhong chuangzao ma? Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe, ta shi du yi de, shi wanneng de.”
